song.title: Doxology(Chris Cleveland)
song.lyrics:
[INTRO] .A
[1] . A praise God from whom all blessings flow . E praise Him all creatures here below . A praise Him above ye Heavenly Host . E A praise Father Son and Holy Ghost
[2] . A praise God the uncreated One . E who sent His Son to die for us . A defeated death He took our sin . E A our praise for Him will never end
[3] . A praise God and let His kingdom reign . E on earth just like in heaven . A His Spirit with us three in one . E A Praise God the Father Spirit Son
